allow: Bash(curl 'https://atleta.cc/api/graphql' -s -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'atleta-session-id: 4exluwv0pj2tu8cwaqmp' -H 'x-xsrf-token: ' -H 'Origin: https://atleta.cc' -H 'Referer: https://atleta.cc/e/SdUE6lPR70dK/resale' --cookie 'atleta_' -d '{""operationName"":""GetRegistrationsForSale"",""variables"":{""id"":""SdUE6lPR70dK"",""tickets"":null,""limit"":10},""query"":""query GetRegistrationsForSale\($id: ID!, $tickets: [String!], $limit: Int!, $invitation_code: String\) {\\n  event\(id: $id\) {\\n    id\\n    registrations_for_sale\(tickets: $tickets, limit: $limit\) {\\n      id\\n      ticket { id title units __typename }\\n      resale { id available total_amount fee public_url public_token __typename }\\n      time_slot { id start_date start_time title multi_date __typename }\\n      promotion { id title __typename }\\n      start_time corral_name __typename\\n    }\\n    __typename\\n  }\\n}""}')
